description: Som Prasad Pandey is a Nepali politician currently belonging to the Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Socialist). He has served as a Member of Parliament for the Palpa-2 constituency multiple times, winning elections in 1994, 1999, and 2018. From October 2015 to August 2016, he was the Minister of Industry, Commerce and Supplies. Pandey also served as a member of the Constituent Assembly from 2014 to 2017 and was the Chairman of the Human Rights and External Affairs Committee of the House of Representatives.
short_description: Nepali politician, member of Parliament, and former Minister of Industry, Commerce and Supplies.
